Cell.Data: Anything between straight brackets - i.e. [ ] - is a formatting tag. Do not change these tags and keep them in the same relative position in the text. Anything between curly brackets - i.e. { } - is a place where text or numbers will be inserted by the game. Do not change the tag, but feel free to change its position in the text to suit the localized text.

Our noble houses produce many scions whose life at court has prepared them well for diplomacy and intrigue. Let us put them to use among the aliens of this world.[br/][br/]Receive {InfluenceIncome} and {EnergyIncome} per [turn/] for every Faction you are at Peace with. This amount increases as your relationship improves.
我们高贵的家族培养了许多通晓权谋与外交的后代，让他们在这个充满异类的世界中发挥作用。[br/][br/]每有一个阵营与你处于和平状态，每[turn/]获得 {InfluenceIncome}和 {EnergyIncome}，此数值会随着关系的进步而提高。

Mutual trust is important amongst allies, but complete trust is a fallacy, so we must keep them on a leash and feed them false information in return for their data.[br/][br/]You do not suffer from the negative effects of having an intelligence sharing pact with other players. In addition, all Colonies get {OperationDefense} against Covert Operations.
盟友之间相互信任非常重要，但决不能完全信任，所以我们必须妥善地处理盟友关系，用虚假的情报换取他们的数据。[br/][br/]与其他玩家签订情报共享协议时不会遭受负面效果。另外，所有殖民地对抗隐秘行动时获得 {OperationDefense}。

We can easily trigger wars far away from our borders to distract our enemies and leave us free reign. All we have to do is point them in the right direction.[br/][br/]You get {OperationalStrength} for Covert Ops. In addition, covert operations are now {StrategicCostModifier} cheaper.
我们可以轻而易举地在我们边境远方挑起战火，从而分散敌人的注意力，保护自身周全。我们需要做的，仅仅是正确地引导他们一下。[br/][br/]进行隐秘行动时获得 {OperationalStrength}，另外，隐秘行动消耗降低 {StrategicCostModifier}。
In these desperate times, everyone must make sacrifices, but the lower class should sacrifice the most.[br/][br/]All Colonies gain {ProductionIncome}, but suffer {Unhappiness}.
在这个充斥着绝望的年代，所有人都必须做出牺牲。阶级越低，付出的牺牲就应该越大。[br/][br/]所有殖民地获得 {ProductionIncome}，但需承受 {Unhappiness}。

Our spies are provided with extra training in stealing military intelligence, granting us a huge advantage on the battlefield.[br/][br/]Infiltrating a Player will give all units a {DamageIncrease} damage bonus against their units.
我们的间谍受过特训，擅长偷取军事机密，为我们的战斗提供优势。[br/][br/]渗透玩家将会使所有单位攻击该玩家单位时获得 {DamageIncrease} 伤害加成。

The Indentured are seeking rights. We can take advantage of this by making them sign a maintenance and ration reduction contract, and in trade they get citizenship and freedom at the end of this venture... should they survive.[br/][br/]Innate Indentured units have their [energy/] cost reduced by {ReductionPercentageEnergy} in colonies.[br/]All Indentured units, including those who became so due to mods, have their upkeep reduced by {ReductionPercentage}.[br/][br/][firecol]Unit upkeep can never be reduced by more than 50%.[/firecol]

契约者想要获得权利，我们可以借此令他们签订一份维护和口粮减少合同，使他们能在合同结束后获得公民身份和自由…前提是他们能够存活下来。[br/][br/]殖民地内原有的契约单位[energy/]消耗降低 {ReductionPercentageEnergy}。[br/]所有契约单位，包括因模块而成为的契约单位，其维持消耗降低 {ReductionPercentage}。[br/][br/][firecol]单位的维持消耗减少不能低于 50%[/firecol]。
Infiltrating a Player will give all owned units {DamageIncrease} added damage against the infiltrated Player's units.
渗透玩家会使所有已拥有的单位攻击被渗透玩家的单位时获得 {DamageIncrease} 伤害加成。
Deploy an Emergency Cloaking Field to provide the target army with [abilityblue]Universal Camouflage[/abilityblue] for {ECFDuration} turns.
部署一片紧急遮蔽力场，目标军队获得[abilityblue]通用伪装[/abilityblue]，持续 {ECFDuration} 回合。
The Cloaking Field has been successfully deployed. The army is hidden from any wandering eyes, unless we let them get too close…
遮蔽力场已成功部署。巡逻军队将无法看到该军队的行踪，只要我们不要靠得太近…
The selected army now has 'Universal Camouflage' for {ECFDuration}[turn/].
所选军队获得了“通用伪装”，持续 {ECFDuration}。

Fire the Pulse Beam Cannon at the target army and adjacent armies, inflicting {PulseBeamCannonDamage} damage and reducing the target's Vision Range by {Visionreduction} hexes for {PulsBeamCannonDuration}.
向目标军队及其相邻军队发射脉冲光束加农炮，造成{PulseBeamCannonDamage}伤害，并使目标的视野范围缩小{Visionreduction}单元格，持续{PulsBeamCannonDuration}。

The Pulse Beam Cannon has delivered a 100% effective hit against the target army. We have reports that a massive amount of damage has been dealt, and that the army will have less vision for a short period.
我们收到报告，脉冲光束加农炮对目标造成了全部效果，造成了大量伤害并使目标军队在短期内视野受损。
The Pulse Beam Cannon missed its target. It has still managed to do some damage, but not nearly as much as we hoped it would. Furthermore, the target army does not suffer from any additional effects.
虽然脉冲光束加农炮未能如我们所愿击中目标，但还是造成了部分伤害。另外，目标军队的视线也没有因此次攻击而受阻。
A Syndicate Pulse Beam Cannon has been fired on one of our armies. They have suffered massive damage, and their vision range has been severely reduced while they recover.
我们的一支军队遭到了辛迪加脉冲光束加农炮的攻击，损失惨重，而且视野范围严重受损，需要一段时间进行恢复。
A Syndicate Pulse Beam Cannon was fired at one of our armies, but our agents have successfully jammed its targeting, minimizing the damage dealt.
我们的一支军队受到了辛迪加脉冲光束加农炮的攻击，但我们的特工成功干扰了目标，已将伤害降至了最小。
The army takes {PulseBeamCannonDamage} damage, their Vision Range is reduced to 1 hex and their Detection is disabled for {PulsBeamCannonDuration}.
军队受到 {PulseBeamCannonDamage} 伤害，视野范围降低至 1 个单元格，并使“侦察”无效，持续 {PulsBeamCannonDuration}。
The army takes {PulseBeamCannonDamage} damage, but their vision is unaffected.
军队受到 {PulseBeamCannonDamage} 伤害，但视野并未受到影响。
Infiltrate the enemy army's sensory systems and gain Vision on that army for {OperationDuration} turns.
渗透敌方军队的传感器系统，获得该军队的视野，持续 {OperationDuration} 回合。
We have succesfully infiltrated the enemy army and can now see what they see.
我们已经成功渗透进了敌方军队，现在可以看到他们所看见的景象了。
We failed to infiltrate the enemy sensors. Perhaps we should try again.
我们未能成功渗透敌方传感器，或许应该再试一次。
Our enemies have infiltrated the sensors of one of our armies and they can now see what we see. We should be careful until we are sure that their access to our systems has been revoked.
我们的敌人渗透进了我方一支军队的传感器并获得了我们的视野。我们应该小心行事，直至撤销他们的系统访问权。
Our enemies tried to infiltrate our sensors. We should stay alert for future attempts.
我们的敌人试图渗透我们的传感器。我们应该引以为戒，日后多加防范。
Target owned Colony has {HappinesIncome}[happiness/] from distractions and festivities.
已被拥有的目标殖民地因娱乐和节日庆典获得 {HappinesIncome}[happiness/]。
The people of this Colony will no longer cause any commotion as we divert their attention elsewhere with festivities.
只要我们能用节日转移民众的注意力，殖民地内的居民就不会制造骚乱。
Reduce the Production output of an enemy Colony by {ProductionReduction} for {IndustrialSabotageDuration}.
使敌方殖民地的产力降低 {ProductionReduction}，持续 {IndustrialSabotageDuration}。
Your saboteurs have succesfully disrupted the production in the target colony. This will severely hamper their production output.
你的破坏成功影响了目标殖民地内的生产，这将极大地减少他们的产出。
Your saboteurs were caught attempting to disrupt production in the target colony. Though the sabotage was thwarted, the operation managed to spark civil unrest in the colony.
你想要破坏目标殖民地生产的计划被发现了。尽管破坏行动受到了阻止，但还是令殖民地内的居民感到了不安。
Hostile saboteurs have successfully disrupted production in one of our colonies. Production output has been reduced, and will remain so unless we take action.
敌方的破坏行动成功影响了我们一个殖民地的生产。殖民地生产减少，如果我们不做出行动，情况将不会有任何改观。
Your agents thwarted an attempt to sabotage production efforts in one of your colonies, but the infiltration has sparked civil unrest.
虽然你的特工成功阻止了一个殖民地内的破坏行动，但敌人的渗透还是令当地居民感到了不安。

All units in a {DiversionProjectorAoE} hex radius area of effect have a {DiversionProjectorStrength} strength chance to become [abilityred]Blinded[/abilityred] and have {DiversionProjectorResistance} resistance against flanking attacks for {BlindedDuration}.
{DiversionProjectorAoE} 个单元格范围内的所有单位有 {DiversionProjectorStrength} 力量几率陷入[abilityred]致盲[/abilityred]并对包抄攻击拥有 {DiversionProjectorResistance}抵抗，持续 {BlindedDuration}。
Target friendly unit gains [abilityblue]Always Flanking[/abilityblue], allowing every attack to be a flanking attack for {OperationDuration}.
目标友方单位获得[abilityblue]始终包抄[/abilityblue]，使所有单位攻击都变为包抄攻击，持续 {OperationDuration}。

Target Biological or Cyborg unit has a {ExecutionStrength} strength chance to be instantly killed. If this fails, the unit instead takes {ExecutionFailDamage} damage and is [abilityred]Staggered[/abilityred].
目标生物或半机械人单位有 {ExecutionStrength} 力量几率被立刻击杀。如果处决失败，则目标单位将受到 {ExecutionFailDamage} 伤害并被[abilityred]动摇[/abilityred]。
Summon a Sentinel onto target hex during combat. The summon lasts until the end of combat.[br/]This unit has long range Arc abilities to neutralize enemies.
战斗期间在目标单元格上召唤一个哨兵。召唤将持续至战斗结束。[br/]哨兵拥有长距离的电弧技能，可瘫痪敌人。
This unit's Vision Range is reduced by {Visionreduction} hexes for {PulsBeamCannonDuration}[turn/].
此单位的视野范围被缩小{Visionreduction}单元格，持续{PulsBeamCannonDuration}[turn/]。

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
